name: How to be a Halloween pumpkin
name_original: How to be a Halloween pumpkin
description:
Halloween is coming, the holiday of pumpkins! What kind of a wonderful life can a perfect pumpkin have? In this game, you need to choose a living environment for this Halloween pumpkin and start its story. Try to find out different lives for this little pumpkin! 

Here is a silly game created by DoughnutOvO (Dongna Chen, who is allergic to pumpkin) and her AI tools friends (maybe they are many people's friends QvQ). Please feel free to leave any comments about the game!

Original scene art: Mid-journey

scene re-creation (by Photoshop): Dongna Chen 

Music: AIVA

Narration, program, characters design, UI: Dongna Chen

Engine: Ren'Py
